Articles.Content:
Sadly jeb is no longer with us, neither is about 20 other kerbals. They all were victims of the viscous Minimus reality Kraken. This Kraken has a habit of vanishing ships or stretching them across space and time. I've lost 5 ships to date.

 

Curently the remaining 3 orange suits and two classes of white suits are on a one way mission to the hook system to build a new space center. Just did the 3k dv burn and I'm about to set a course for laythe 

Edited July 17, 2017 by ArmchairPhysicist
Currently orbiting the Mun in my refueling depot, awaiting a mining crew.

He's in orbit of Kerbin in a giant space station

 

https://ibb.co/czLPPk

On 7/12/2017 at 4:24 PM, Leafbaron said:

He's stepping through the door, floating a most peculiar way, he tells me the stars look very different today. Sitting in a tin can far above the world, Kerbin is blue and there's not much Jeb can do.

is his circuit dead? Is there something wrong?

Jebediah is currently on a rescue mission to rescue Burberry Kerbman, who is in a retrograde solar orbit.

He is about to begin the burn to reverse his orbit, about 19,000 dv needed for it, and the burn will take more than 100 minutes:

 

Edited July 25, 2017 by linuxgurugamer
He is in the course of designing a space gulag for some capitalist traitors he captured the other day

my jeb is waiting for be the first kerbal of my pc on landing on other site that is not the ksc

On 17/7/2017 at 4:29 PM, ArmchairPhysicist said:

Sadly jeb is no longer with us, neither is about 20 other kerbals. They all were victims of the viscous Minimus reality Kraken. This Kraken has a habit of vanishing ships or stretching them across space and time. I've lost 5 ships to date.

 

Curently the remaining 3 orange suits and two classes of white suits are on a one way mission to the hook system to build a new space center. Just did the 3k dv burn and I'm about to set a course for laythe 

wait your jeb is dead?

my condolences

if you'll colonize laythe leave some kerbals in kerbin, i'll launch them to a suicide mission to minmus in my delta IV for resolving the thing of the kraken, also it's a good idea for a movie
well he now is in duna, awaiting for a rover, good luck jeb
At the astronaut complex, waiting for his next combat mission.
On the runway in an A10C waiting until i finish remapping all the textures for the cockpit
On the Moon, not the Mun.

On 7/25/2017 at 10:59 AM, linuxgurugamer said:

Jebediah is currently on a rescue mission to rescue Burberry Kerbman, who is in a retrograde solar orbit.

He is about to begin the burn to reverse his orbit, about 19,000 dv needed for it, and the burn will take more than 100 minutes:

 

Actually, he was in mission control, seething because Valentina was pn the rescue mission

On 7/25/2017 at 10:38 AM, RoadRunnerAerospace said:

is his circuit dead? Is there something wrong?

So now I want to listen to that song..thanks


Also my Jeb is splat somewhere on kerbin... Before I even knew about the 4 orange suits that are the only orange ones... 25 kerbals later and now I find out I messed up my career along time ago lol
well, i launched yesterday the EM-1, that in this save was the first manned craft, but he wasn't there, so he's waiting for be onboard the CST-100

He has just recently returned from the Ulyseses, a Low Kerbin Orbit space station, having just finished and 80 day stint aboard. He is 'mildly' upset that an all female team of 3 rookies (at least in his eyes) were the first crew aboard the new Kerbin orbital station Vangaurd-1, leaving just hours before his arrival at the KSC.
He`s hanging about the astronaut complex!

Dead. I crashed an ultralight vehicle into the VAB, and at that precise moment I had to leave for <redacted>.

Well that's in my main save.

In all the others he's on kerbin

Dead. 

He let Bob have a turn flying my Forward Swept Wing R-15 Fighter, then realized Bob was a Scientist, not a Pilot. the inevitably crashed.
retired because hes seems to be the only kerbal to end up dead

Jeb, Bill & Bob are currently orbiting Duna, while waiting for Kerbin to come into phase.

Val is currently at the space center. In about 4 months time, she'll lead an expedition to Dres. Her ride is in orbit, fueled up and ready, while the rest of the expedition's crafts are also getting prepped around Kerbin. 10 days before departure, these 9* brave Kerbals will board the planes that'll get them to their vessels.

*Make them 11 -forgot I'm manning the miners with both engineers and pilots 

Edited October 27, 2017 by Atkara
Trapped with Val in some parachute-free spacecraft, orbiting kerbin.
Mine died on a mission but now magically he's back from the dead!
He got killed in an incident with a jet engine car...
currently rescuing 6 kerbals in an RP series I'm taking part in
Jeb is often the accidental test pilot of experimental launches that were meant to be uncrewed. As such, he's been killed a fair few times.
